basics.name: Guillermo Beltrán
basics.label: Senior Front-End Engineer / Tech Lead
basics.summary: Front-End Engineer with over 10 years of experience building and leading web applications for high-traffic SaaS, classifieds and travel platforms. Strong background in React, performance optimization, analytics integration, and data compliance. Proven record in leading migrations, improving product observability, and enabling measurable business growth. Passionate about scalable architectures, user-centric design, and cross-functional collaboration within product-driven teams.

work.name: Distillery (Rocketmiles by RocketTravel)
work.summary: Led the migration of a legacy AngularJS 1.8 webapp to React, improving development, maintainability and user experience for over millions of daily users across major airline partners. Spearheaded the Webpack to Vite migration, cutting build times by 30+ minutes and streamlining the CI/CD pipeline.
highlights: Led the migration of AngularJS 1.8 to React for millions of daily users
Webpack to Vite migration, cutting build times by 30+ minutes
Led the design, architecture, and implementation of a cross-sell widget in collaboration with partner teams
Successfully launched and integrated the solution across multiple partner websites
Enabled users to book hotels post-flight checkout, driving more than a thousand additional daily bookings with measurable revenue growth
Developed partner-facing dashboards with Snowplow and real-time visualizations via Grafana for internal alerts
Cut reporting latency from 4 hours to real-time, improving partner visibility and decision-making
Implemented Datadog RUM for front-end observability and error tracking
Introduced structured logging and alerting workflows for early issue detection
Owned cookie consent compliance using OneTrust: maintained consent banners, led semi-annual audits per partner, and managed cookie categories for CCPA and GDPR alignment
Collaborated cross-functionally with product, design, backend, and analytics teams to define API contracts, set tracking standards
Ran over 20 A/B experiments (90% success rate)
Mentored 2-3 front-end engineers per squad, leading planning, reviews, and technical design with a focus on open collaboration

work.name: Parallel Staff (Intrado Project)
work.summary: Led front-end development for a video-first meeting platform, delivering key features such as custom branding, multi-monitor previews, screen sharing, and participant management.
highlights: Optimized the web client performance, enabling meetings to support up to 300% more participants
Extended compatibility to mobile browsers
Reduced CPU and memory usage for a smoother, more reliable user experience

work.name: Wizeline
work.summary: Thynkbooks, an AI-assisted bank transaction categorization tool that simplified bookkeeping and automated report generation, enabling users to easily view and export tax-ready financial summaries. Designed and delivered the Coppel Employee Training Program, empowering internal e-commerce teams to adopt modern development practices and emerging web technologies, directly contributing to improved site performance and revenue growth.
highlights: Developed Thynkbooks, an AI-assisted bank transaction categorization tool
Simplified bookkeeping and automated report generation
Enabled users to easily view and export tax-ready financial summaries
Designed and delivered the Coppel Employee Training Program
Empowered internal e-commerce teams to adopt modern development practices and emerging web technologies
Directly contributed to improved site performance and revenue growth

work.name: Segundamano (Adevinta Group)
work.summary: Modernized high-traffic classified pages (1M daily users) with lazy-loading, pagination, and SEO-optimized server rendering, improving performance and conversions. Revamped the payment funnel as part of the Payments team, integrating new payment gateways such as PayPal and Conekta, and enhancing the overall checkout experience.
highlights: Modernized high-traffic classified pages (1M daily users)
Implemented lazy-loading, pagination, and SEO-optimized server rendering
Improved performance and conversions
Revamped the payment funnel, integrating new payment gateways such as PayPal and Conekta
Enhanced the overall checkout experience
Implemented a virtual coin refund system for users purchasing classified ad boosts
Increased user retention and payment flexibility
Onboarded and mentored new developers to standardize development and testing practices across teams
Developed internal back-office solutions to streamline workflows for customer support, marketing, and sales teams
Improved operational efficiency and cross-department collaboration

education.institution: Instituto Tecnológico y de Estudios Superiores de Monterrey (ITESM)

languages.fluency: Professional Working Proficiency (B1, Distillery Internal Evaluation)

projects.name: begodev.io
projects.description: Personal portfolio and professional website. Platform to showcase projects, experience and skills as a front-end developer.
highlights: Minimalist design focused on performance
Full-stack project portfolio
Hosted on own VPS

projects.name: Resume
projects.description: Interactive and printable CV/Resume built with Astro. Displays professional experience, technical skills and projects in an elegant and accessible way.
highlights: Interactive and responsive CV
Optimized for printing
Based on JSON Resume schema

projects.name: Cronio
projects.description: Smart timer app for workouts. Configure routines with AI using formulas like EMOM, AMRAP or custom intervals. Share your routines with students and friends through unique links.
highlights: Smart gym timer
AI-powered routine configuration
Support for EMOM, AMRAP and custom intervals
Share routines through unique links

projects.name: Angievaz.shop
projects.description: Complete ecommerce platform with admin panel and web store. Product, inventory, order and payment management. Elegant and feminine design optimized for conversion.
highlights: Full-stack ecommerce
Complete admin panel
Inventory and order management
Conversion-optimized design
